name: Space Blasters (AKSpartan70)
description:
This is my final 2D Shooter project. The additional modifications I made to my game are:

- Adjusted level requirement caps and enemy configurations for Levels 1-3

- Two new levels also featuring logically increasing level completion requirements

- Adjustments to the Level Selection tab of the Main Menu, allowing for quickplay selection for all 5 in-game levels

- Adjustment to the Player fire speed to improve combat feel and alter player fire sound

Credits:

Created by Josh Gutbrod
